meanings.sent2: She dignifies every task with her grace.
meanings.sent3: The cat dignifies itself by sitting on the throne.
meanings.sent4: His speech dignifies the importance of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The golden sunset dignifies the end of a perfect day.

meanings.definition: To give dignity or importance to
meanings.sent1: A smile dignifies even the simplest gesture.
meanings.sent3: The clown dignifies the party with his silly hat.
meanings.sent4: Her presence dignifies the room with elegance.
meanings.sent5: The old book dignifies the shelf with wisdom.

meanings.definition: To elevate in rank or status
meanings.sent1: Hard work dignifies a person in society.
meanings.sent2: The promotion dignifies his position in the company.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand dignifies the frog into a prince.
meanings.sent4: Education dignifies the mind with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The crown dignifies the king with authority.
